result.execSummary:
The defendant Ronald E. Bartsch was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Homicide by Negligent Operation/Vehicle, a class G felony, Wisconsin Statutes 940.10(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: $518 costs--DOC collect.  If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.
Comply with any testing/treatment; follow through with all caregivers' recommendations.

timeConds.notes:
With Huber and diversion.  Stayed-Call Diversion 373-3880 M-F by 7-20-2015; to Report by 9-18-2015.  If not, Commitment to issue without huber  privileges and new criminal charges. 
****08-25-15  Court authorizes defendant to serve conditional jail time in DuPage County IL. Rock County Sheriff to verify defendant is serving time in DuPage County IL has been accepted, has arrived and has served all of his time. ******
Complete 50 hours of community service per year.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Ronald E. Bartsch

records.addlTxt: Discharge - Regular (July 15, 2020)
Effective July 15, 2020

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: July 15, 2015 & August 25, 2015

Defendant Ronald E. Bartsch in court with attorney Joshua H. Klaff.  Katharine Buker appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Court authorizes defendant to serve conditional jail time in DuPage County IL. Rock County Sheriff to verify defendant is serving time in DuPage County IL has been accepted, has arrived and has served all of his time.
Motion hearing at 08-25-2015 01:00 pm
Hearing at 08-13-2015 01:00 pm
Associated with Charge #1

Defendant Ronald E. Bartsch in court with attorney Joshua H. Klaff.  Katharine Buker appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Exhibit 1 received.  Victim present, addresses the Court.  Sentence withheld, Court orders 5 years probation with conditions:  comply with all testing/treatment deemed necessary and all caregivers' recommendations; 1 year Rock Co Jail with Huber and diversion; no sentence credit; DOC to collect $518 costs; DOC to collect restitution; complete 50 hours community service per year; driver's license revoked 1 year.  Felon warnings advised.
#1--received

Defendant Ronald E. Bartsch in court with attorney Joshua H. Klaff.  Scott H. Dirks appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Guilty plea, Court finds defendant guilty.  PSI ORDERED, to be filed by 7-8-2015.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for July 15, 2015 at 01:00 pm.

Defendant Ronald E. Bartsch in court with attorney Richard L. Jones.  Mason C. Braunschweig appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Final pre-trial scheduled for May 12, 2015 at 11:00 am.  Jury selection scheduled for May 18, 2015 at 08:30 am.  Jury trial scheduled for May 18, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Calendar call on December 4, 2014 at 09:00 am.
Administrative assignment transfer, approved by Presiding Judge James P. Daley.

Defendant Ronald E. Bartsch in court with attorney Richard L. Jones.  Katharine Buker appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Final pre-trial scheduled for February 4, 2015 at 09:00 am.  Jury selection scheduled for February 9, 2015 at 09:00 am.  Jury trial scheduled for February 9, 2015 at 09:00 am.
Defendant Ronald E. Bartsch in court with attorney Richard L. Jones.  Scott H. Dirks appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Status conference scheduled for October 1, 2014 at 02:00 pm.
